heading: Amona Corporation
description: Amona Corporate Pte Ltd offers a range of Telecommunications Products and Services. Covering both wire and wireless domain of the communications. Our offerings consists of standard off-the-shelf products as well as tailored to specific requirements. We are committed to ensure highest quality of products, delivery and services.The RF products we offered a wide range of frequencies, from public safety domain application of 380MHz to Telco operations of 5G frequency range of 6GHz. The range will offerings ensure seamless deployment for any outdoor and indoor coverage requirements.
